channel.title: [317] Login/ Logout screen
channel.description: 1st off im using quarantine v.2.0 source. ok, when i login a popup window comes up. it says quarantine zone in large Word art like letters. How and where do i change this to be my servers name? and when i click on the logout door in the top right, it opens a "click here to log out" button in the bag space, above it says quarantine zone. How and where do i change this? any help would be appreciated. i have teamviewer if you wanna do this for me. or i can do it by myself with GREAT instructions. THANKS!! :)

item.title: [317] Login/ Logout screen
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

It may be a custom sprite, look in your client.

item.title: [317] Login/ Logout screen
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:
